name: markt.de
overview:
markt.de is one of Germany’s leading classifieds websites with about 1,5 million ads. Founded in 2005, the classifieds portal adapted the concept of the local market for the Internet: buyer and seller meet online and finalize the deal locally. The local classifieds, called Kleinanzeigen, at markt.de attract many thousands of new ads every day. Visit markt.de if you are interested in classified ads concerning job opportunities, local services as well as buying or selling pets, vehicles, bicycles, and other merchandise.

markt.de is a part of markt.gruppe GmbH & Co. KG â€“ a holding founded by Georg von Holtzbrinck, Dr. Ippen and the WAZ Mediengruppe, which comprises several online portals and over 150 newspaper titles from 50 publishers attracting 15 million readers daily.
